item.description:
Walking from the Greenway to the North End, Rabia's (http://www.rabias.com...) has occupied the first restaurant slot on the right-hand side of Salem Street for about the last 15 years. They specialize in seafood, and have a raw bar, but there are lots of pasta and meat dishes to choose from also. Price ranges are: Antipasti $6-16 Pasta $18 Meat/Fish $19-28. As usual, we'll have a cocktail/mingle hour by the bar from 6:00-7:00 for those who can come a little earlier. Then we'll sit down to order dinner at about 7:00. For our after-party, we'll head over to Caffe Vittoria for coffee and dessert. The nearest T-stop to the North End is Haymarket. (Orange & Green Lines)

Important: Please access our "About" tab for further guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar
item.name: Rabia's- Dinner
